Note:
Burden formerly 1457; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 253.
Subjects: complaints; Christ, complaint to man; crucifixion; crucifixion
_description: Christ’s complaint to man — one stanza rhyme royal with 4-line burden (abab): ‘In a slumbir late as I was / I harde a voice lowde call & crye / Amende the man of thi trespace / & aske forgeveness or euyr thou dye’ (repeated)

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
Beholde he said my creatureWhome I did make solyke vnto
                    me…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines:
…Fast I was naylyd for thyne offenceTherefore remembir the or
                    thou go hence
